text.div:
NCH Provider SSA State Code

The two -digit numeric social security administration (SSA) state code where provider or facility is located. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/prvdrstatecd

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in https://bluebutton.cms.gov/assets/ig/CodeSystem-prvdr-state-cd

name: NCH Provider SSA State Code
description: The two -digit numeric social security administration (SSA) state code where provider or facility is located. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/prvdr_state_cd
